snippet: Rick Santorum says his comments about food stamps last week were the result of his having been tongue-tied and was not a reference to black people.
abstract: Rick Santorum says his comments about food stamps last week were the result of his having been tongue-tied and was not a reference to black people.
lead_paragraph: DERRY, N.H. -- Rick Santorum said Monday that comments he made last week in Iowa about food stamps that some construed as racially charged were the result of his having been tongue-tied and were not a reference to black people.

headline.main: Santorum Defends Comments About Food Stamps
